entry.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

entry.title: Veekshi28/Vision-Insight-Diabetic-Retinopathy-predict: Diabetic retinopathy is one of the leading causes of blindness, and early detection is key. The goal of VisionInsight is to create a smart, lightweight diagnostic tool where users can upload a retina image and instantly get a severity prediction ‚Äî from No_DR to Proliferative_DR
entry.content: Diabetic retinopathy is one of the leading causes of blindness, and early detection is key. The goal of VisionInsight is to create a smart, lightweight diagnostic tool where users can upload a retina image and instantly get a severity prediction ‚Äî from No_DR to Proliferative_DR

entry.title: Kaso78/SolarProbe: Solar Probe is a lightweight web dashboard for monitoring solar activity in near real time. It integrates data from NOAA and NASA, including X-ray flux, solar proton levels, and sunspot metrics.

entry.title: Nikhilkumarseeda/user-crud-server: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.
